Tags.Description: Floating point data with arbitrary values
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Float

Tags.Description: Each voxel represents an X-ray absorption value
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Absorption

Tags.Description: Binary volume where each voxel's value can be either 0 or 1.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Segmented

Tags.Description: Each voxel is labeled with a unique integer representing its connected region.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Labeled

Tags.Description: Each non-zero voxel encodes its distance to the closest zero-valued voxel.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Distance

Tags.Description: Segmented volume with a three-dimensional grid of chords running through it along all axes.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Volume.Chord

Tags.Description: Holds an entry for each connected region in the volume.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Table.CCA

Tags.Description: Holds an entry for each chord in the volume.
Tags.Name: de.uni_stuttgart.Voxie.Tags.Table.ChordAnalysis
